detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract TokenBank (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3a0e9acd953ffc0dd18d63603488846a6b8b2b01.sol#48-105) has payable functions:
	 - TokenBank.fallback() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3a0e9acd953ffc0dd18d63603488846a6b8b2b01.sol#61-65)
	 - TokenBank.Deposit() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3a0e9acd953ffc0dd18d63603488846a6b8b2b01.sol#67-74)
	 - TokenBank.WithdrawToHolder(address,uint256) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3a0e9acd953ffc0dd18d63603488846a6b8b2b01.sol#87-101)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:
Ownable.changeOwner(address).addr (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3a0e9acd953ffc0dd18d63603488846a6b8b2b01.sol#14) lacks a zero-check on :
		- newOwner = addr (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3a0e9acd953ffc0dd18d63603488846a6b8b2b01.sol#18)
Modifier Ownable.onlyOwner() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3a0e9acd953ffc0dd18d63603488846a6b8b2b01.sol#30-33) does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected token.call(bytes4(sha3()(transfer(address,uint256))),to,amount) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/0x3a0e9acd953ffc0dd18d63603488846a6b8b2b01.sol#44):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
